sceneDescription.title: The Admiral Benbow Inn on the Devon Coast

setting.location: Admiral Benbow Inn, Devon coast, England
setting.weather: Overcast skies with salty sea breeze

characters.appearance: Boy, 13 years old, brown hair, slender build
characters.clothing: Simple brown wool vest, white linen shirt, knee-length breeches
characters.action: Wiping down wooden counter with cloth

characters.appearance: Middle-aged woman, graying hair tied back, tired expression
characters.clothing: Dark blue dress with white apron, practical boots
characters.action: Carrying tray of mugs towards common room

scene.mainElements: Interior of seaside inn with wooden beams, nautical decorations on walls including old ship wheels and nets, large fireplace with dying embers
scene.details: Shelves behind bar filled with bottles and pewter mugs, worn wooden tables and benches scattered throughout room, maritime charts and paintings of sailing ships on walls, small window showing glimpse of rocky coastline and gray sea beyond
scene.background: Through the window, steep cliffs and churning sea visible, seagulls circling in distance
scene.atmosphere: Quiet anticipation of evening guests, smell of salt air mixed with wood smoke, comfortable but weathered establishment

composition.focus: The boy at the counter as central figure
composition.depth: Counter and boy in foreground, woman with tray in middle ground, window showing sea vista in background
